A: Depending on geographic area, and if you have a well defined system, you can get reliable ERDS alerts up to 5 days.

Q: Is hydrological model or land cover based model more reliable? 
A: It depends; clouds have an impact. We'll get into that more next week!
Next week: inundation mapping using #MODIS data, and using @qgis.

text: All the recordings and slides for our advanced #NDVIwebinar are now posted: https://t.co/xyHG768tyJ
The recording for today's #NDVIwebinar will be up in a few hours. https://t.co/xyHG768tyJ
Before you start using MODIS NDVI images in @qgis think about making the MODIS-generated file names shorter to keep things simple.
The website for today's demo to download MODIS NDVI images is having some issues. We'll walk you through what to do when it's back up.
#NDVI anomalies are often used to show current vegetation patterns relative to the long-term average. #NDVIwebinar
There are now products for @NASA_Landsat to correct for water vapor, ozone & aerosol optical thickness, clouds, & more. #NDVIwebinar
If you're interested in vegetation moisture, you may want to use the Normalized Difference Moisture Index (NDMI). #NDVIwebinar
The Soil Adjusted Vegetation Index (SAVI) minimizes the effects of soil brightness. #NDVIwebinar
Several spectral indices have been developed as modifications of #NDVI: EVI, SAVI, MSAVI, NDMI, NBR and dNBR. #NDVIwebinar

text: If you missed the live #NDVIwebinar, the recording will be up in a few hours. https://t.co/xyHG768tyJ

Q: When is it recommended to use EVI or NDVI to study vegetation?
A: If you're studying something with high biomass - try EVI. #NDVIwebinar
Next week we'll show you how to make your own #NDVI modeling maps. #NDVIwebinar
The Global Agricultural Modeling (GLAM) project uses #remotesensing with @USDA monitoring systems. https://t.co/E8cpLXedlE #NDVIwebinar
The Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI) is a standard product from #MODIS. #NDVIwebinar
.@NASAEarthData also has some great webinars: https://t.co/CsdRhbs13e #NDVIwebinar
You can find general info on #MODIS @NASAEarthData: https://t.co/wn9TBxMDPl and the #LPDAAC: https://t.co/LY5ODIu0be #NDVIwebinar
Compared to @NASA_Landsat, #MODIS tiles are much larger & cover more area. #NDVIwebinar
Today's #NDVIwebinar looks at #MODIS NDVI. Slides are available in English & Spanish: https://t.co/xyHG768tyJ https://t.co/DZ0wRJHtdB
